law.history: Repealed 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 560, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 190, effective January 1, 1989. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 274, sec. 164. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 142, sec. 5, effective June 16, 1960.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Owner of abandoned property loses income or increments accruing thereafter.
